channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maduro is set to make his first appearance in a US courtroom on drug trafficking charges
item.description: Deposed Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro is set to make his first appearance in an American courtroom.

item.title: Congress returns amid Venezuela operation; facing deadline to avert shutdown
item.description: Lawmakers return to Washington this week, staring down an end-of-month deadline to avert another government shutdown.

item.title: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz ends reelection bid
item.description: Walz said he would not be able to give a campaign all of his attention.

item.title: Maduro to appear in U.S. court, Trump threatens other nations
item.description: Ousted Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro and his wife appear before a federal judge in New York to face charges related to drug trafficking.

item.title: What to expect from Nicolás Maduro's arraignment

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Holocaust survivor Eva Schloss, stepsister of Anne Frank, dies at 96
item.description: Auschwitz survivor Eva Schloss, stepsister of Anne Frank, has died at 96

item.title: WATCH: Sculpture and spectacle at China's ice festival
item.description: China is unveiling its biggest annual Ice and Snow World festival yet.
